definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse

sentences.chinese: 是名詞子句當受詞，也是補語。

sentences.english: "right" table, which appears rightmost in the JOIN clause are included.
sentences.chinese: 第二張表即右表，出現在JOIN子句的最右邊的。

sentences.english: Gets the offset within the method body, in bytes, of this exception-handling clause.
sentences.chinese: 取得這個例外處理子句的主體長度，以位元組爲單位。

sentences.english: You can use these clauses in any combination to achieve the desired effect.
sentences.chinese: 您可以任意組合使用這些子句，以達到期望的效果。

sentences.english: The authors updated clause searching method to first-order by partial instantiation method.
sentences.chinese: 結合部分實例化方法將子句搜索方法提升至一階。

sentences.english: Attempts to retrieve the security token that is referenced in the specified object.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試檢索與指定的密鑰標識符子句相匹配的安全令牌。

sentences.english: Retrieves the security token that matches the specified key identifier clause.
sentences.chinese: 擷取與指定之金鑰識別碼子句相符的安全性權杖。

sentences.english: Deciding satisfiability of clause set is one of the active research topics in the automated reasoning field.
sentences.chinese: 子句集的可滿足性判定是自動證明領域的熱點之一。

sentences.english: A nonrestrictive clause is separated from the main clause by a comma or commas.
sentences.chinese: 非限定用法的形容詞子句與主句之間有加逗點分離。

sentences.english: There can be multiple files specified in this clause.
sentences.chinese: 在該子句中可以指定多個文件。

sentences.english: Hence method resolution clauses in an ancestor class have no effect on the reimplemented interface.
sentences.chinese: 因此祖先類中的方法決定子句不影響再實現接口。

sentences.english: If there are no foreign keys, it does not generate an ON clause and the tables become a cross product.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有外鍵，則不生成ON子句，表將變成矢量積。

sentences.english: Attempts to retrieve the key that is referenced in the specified key identifier clause.
sentences.chinese: 檢索與指定的密鑰標識符子句相匹配的安全令牌。

sentences.english: "left" table, which appears leftmost in the JOIN clause, are included.
sentences.chinese: 第一張表即左表，出現在JOIN子句的最左邊的。

sentences.english: Explains the concepts behind clauses and operators used in queries.
sentences.chinese: 說明在查詢中所使用之子句和運算子的基本概念。

sentences.english: This clause cannot be run independently.
sentences.chinese: 這個子句不能獨立運行。
